text: West Ham station is a London Underground, Docklands Light Railway and National Rail station. It is on the District Line, Hammersmith & City Line, Jubilee Line and is served by c2c train services. It is in Travelcard Zone 3, and is managed by London Underground. All open platforms have step-free access to the street and each other. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:District line stations Category:Hammersmith & City line stations Category:Jubilee line stations Category:Docklands Light Railway stations in the London Borough of Newham Category:West Ham
title: West Ham station
